Description: A Times Canada correspondent recalls how meeting an Indigenous chef gave him a powerful and belated history lesson about Canada s mistreatment of Indigenous people
Title: My Long Overdue Education about Canadian Residential Schools
Author: Dan Bilefsky

Description: Snatched up in cattle carts and by bus, tens of thousands of indigenous children taken to Canadian residential schools run mostly by the Catholic Church lived a paramilitary lifestyle, waking early to pray, waiting rigidly in lines and enduring regular beat
Title: No chance to be children life in Canada's residential schools Reuters
Author: Anna Mehler Paperny

Description: Video conferencing services have for years boasted that their technology is intuitive to use or integrated to function with other tools, but now vendors such as Google and Cisco can hardly go a blog post without trumpeting a different attribute inclusiv
Title: Skin in the game Video chat apps tout 'inclusive' AI features Reuters
Author: Paresh Dave

Title: Furlough was a radical success Now let s talk about a universal basic income Zoe Williams
